channel.title: Hosting issue
channel.description:
I have a hosting issue, i cannot figure out how to make the exception in my firewall. If anybody would teamveiwer me, and help me with this issue
Please respond :D thanks guys

item.title: Hosting issue
item.dc:creator: @mattr91 mattr91
item.description:
@mattr91 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:539028”][quote author=mattr91 link=topic=657866.msg4401042#msg4401042 date=1390652141]
Hosting issue on what. If it’s a vps open the firewall and make a new rule. I think it’s the same on windows pc.
[/quote]You say “just open the firewall and create a new rule.” But before that he said “I can’t figure out how to open the firewall and create a new rule.”

But yes, hosting issue on what?[/quote] he didn’t say that he said (i cannot figure out how to make the exception in my
firewall) sounds to me that he is in the firewall but don’t know what to do

Read full topic

But yes, hosting issue on what?[/quote]mate you have to go on teamviewer to find out. and add him on skype.
